name: Elvish Rootings
description:
Let the roots take hold and the Mystical Brew come to life.
(This game was created for the Global Game Jam 2023)

Welcome to Elvish Rootings, where you get to embark on an enchanting journey as Elidar, the Elder of your village. Your mission is to gather the ingredients for the Mystical Brew, a powerful elixir of your people.

In the first stage, venture into the forest and collect the roots of the Evergreen Vines, scattered throughout its lush wilderness. The roots hold the key to unlocking the full potential of the Mystical Brew.

In the second stage, you will search for the Eldertree Sprouts, a rare and vital ingredient in your quest. Once collected, you must mix the ingredients in the cauldron, carefully concocting the Mystical Brew.

A bonus stage for the extremely skilled!

Download now and join Elidar on his enchanted journey!
